Richard Christopher Harrison (amụrụ n'afọ 1979) bụ ónyé America na-emepụta ihe ndekọ na onye na-ede egwu si Washington, D.C., ọkachamara na R&B na egwu hip hop.

Onye mmeri nke Grammy Award, a maara Harrison nke ọma màkà ịmepụta egwu dịka "Get Right" (nke Jennifer Lopez mere), "1 Thing" (nke Amerie mere) na "Crazy in Love" (nke Beyoncé na Jay-Z mere). Harrison bụ ónyé guzobere Richcraft Entertainment, akara nke nwere ndị na-ese ihe dịka ónyé na-agụ egwu Amerie, otu R&B ụmụ agbọghọ RichGirl, na onye na-eti egwu Young Steff.

Ónyé na-akpọ piano na onye na-afụ opi, site na nwata Harrison gosipụtara ikike ịkpọ egwu ọ nụrụ na redio, mgbè e mesịrị ọ gara Mahadum Howard na Washington, D.C., na-agụ akwụkwọ akụkọ ihe méré eme na egwu hip-hop.
Nnukwu nkwekọrịta egwu mbụ nke Harrison bịara na 1999 mgbè Harrison na Mary J
Blige rụkọrọ ọrụ na "Beautiful Ones" maka abọm ya Mary
N'afọ 2001, o mepụtara ụlọ ọrụ mmepụta nke ya, Richcraft Inc., ma dee ma mepụta abọm mbụ Amerie, All I Have ozugbo
N'afọ 2004, o ritere Grammy Award màkà Beyoncé's "Crazy in Love", na nhọpụta màkà ọrụ ya na album Usher's Confessions
